description: Adds the specified tags to the specified Direct Connect resource. Each resource can have a maximum of 50 tags. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value. If a tag with the same key is already associated with the resource, this action updates its value.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to add. (dict) --- Information about a tag. The key. value (string) --- The value.
